findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: The massUpdatePools(), setStartTime() functions can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: Owner can change bonePerBlock value
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to modify the bonePerBlock value.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw ERC20 tokens
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to withdraw ERC20 tokens.

findings.title: Owner can change dev and fee addresses
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the developer and fee addresses.

findings.title: Owner can change referral commission rate
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to modify the referral commission rate.

findings.title: Owner can change withdrawal fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the withdrawal fee, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Dev address can change start and end time
findings.description: The dev address has the privilege to modify the start and end times.

findings.title: IBoneMasterChef contract may take withdrawal fee, even in emergencyWithdraw() function
findings.description: The IBoneMasterChef contract has a potential vulnerability where it may take a withdrawal fee even when the emergencyWithdraw() function is called.

findings.title: Unauditable Interfaces in IBoneMasterChef Contract
findings.description: The IBoneMasterChef contract has interfaces that could not be audited, which may cause some functions to work differently than expected.

findings.title: 10% of user reward also mints to dev address
findings.description: The contract mints 10% of the user's reward to the developer's address.
